general.standard_conclusion: Standard Companion's gameplay is pretty straightforward: you utilise his skills to get buffs while adapting your gameplay based on the standard weapon you have chosen.

artist.paragraph: [Resonate Skill] and [Support Skill] create a [Scarlet Shade] and [Flame Lily] which inflict burn for 5s. After consuming 10 [Flame Lilies] Rafayel gets an ATK buff for 10s and additionally his attack range is also increased. To create more [Flame Lilies] and trigger the passive faster you can use a high speed weapon like [Hunter Firearms].

flame_lily.caption: Flame Lilies summoned by Rafayel

scarlet_shade.caption: Scarlet shade left by Rafayel's Support Skill leaves Burn on exit

artist.summary: Collect [Flame Lily] → Get ATK buff + range increase

fresh_paint.paragraph: [Charge Attack] and [Support Skill] inflict [Tinctus] stacking it up to 5 times. [Active Skill], [Resonance Skill] or [Ardent Oath]  detonate them, dealing ATK DMG based on the number of stacks and restore HP to both of you. Detonation of 5 stacks reduce enemy's DEF by 20% for 5s. To inflict more [Tinctus] use high speed weapon like [Hunter Firearms].

phantom_of_the_siren.paragraph: [Support Skill] leaves behind [Reprise] which reduces enemies movement speed by 50% for 5s. Using [Support Skill] after a [Passive Skill] leaves [Echo] which increases the DMG dealt to enemies by 10% for 5s. To utilise it faster using high speed weapon like [Hunter Firearm].

echo.caption: Echo circle caused by Rafayel's Passive Skill

abysswalker.summary: For Abysswalker there's no actial rotation but in a nutshell:
tips: Abysswalker has a special skill called [Potential]. It requires 6 stacks.
You can collect those by using a [Charge Attack] when you see a [Beacon] on the enemy or by collecting a [Fishtail Beacon] that appears after using a [Support Skill].
Triggering that [Potential] on collection all 6 stacks consumes them and increases CRIT Rate by 15% for 5s and allows Rafayel to deal big DMG on the enemy.
You can also see buffs being applied on your MC above your HP bar and his buffs near his icon:
rotations: When using [Support Skill] wait for [Beacon] to collect it

tips: Your main priority with God of the Tides in the battle are:
- Building [Faith]: attack with MC, Rafayel and [Sea Spirit]s
- At full [Faith] triggering [Heavenly Rain] (+30% DMG, [Sea Spirit]s levels up)
[Sea Spirit] has 3 levels. It can be increased by [Passive Skill]  and R1.
Level 1: does DMG based on ATK + HP.
Level 2: ATK Speed is increased by 20%.
god_of_the_tides.summary: Remember to time your main sources of DMG with enemies shields which can be broken only by [Resonance Skill].You can always check if the buffs up above your HP and near his icon.
rotations: 1. [Active Skill] (CRIT Rate field, stay inside it)
2. [Basic Attack]s + [Support Skill] + [Perfect Dodge] (For creating as much [Sea Spirit]s and restoring [Faith])

tips: Lemurian Sea God may seem quite complex at first but his rotations are quite straightforward and improve with Ranks.
Your gameplay is centred around [Sea God Mark] and his Special State. When a [Charged Attack] empowered by [Sea God Mark] hits an enemy, it reduces the [Support Skill] cooldown by 1.5s.

Basically he has two states normal and [Ocean's Descent]. To active it you need to perform [Basic Attacks] and an [Active Skill] to full your yellow part of the bar. To full Rafayel's white part you should click on his icon when his [Support Skill] is up and to trigger it faster you can perform a perfect dodge.

On full [Ocean's Descent] button will appear. On trigger it will change to  [Divine Favor] for 11s. In that state Rafayel will throw lightning. And you are the main star right now!  Consuming [Sea God Mark] is greatly empowered in that state. Additionally [Active Skill]  will generate [Lightning Crystal], dodging right into it will detonate it dealing massive DMG and restoring 0.3◆  also reducing [Active Skill] cooldown by 3,3s! When state is over and if the [Lightning Crystal] still exists it will be detonated.Usually you are able to make the rotation 3 times during the [Divine Favor], with Ranks it is possible up to do 4!
So the whole rotation would look like this:
lemurian_sea_god.rotations: [Resonance Skill]  + stack MC's [Basic Attack] & [Active Skill] (don't consume [Sea God Mark] too close to changing states) + Rafayel's [Support Skill] +  [Resonance skill]  →  [Ocean's Descent] → consume [Sea God Mark] + [Active Skill] leaves  [Lightning Crystal] + dodge in it (repeat till the end) → repeat the whole rotation.
